main event: A bright silver to white object was observed over Stewart AFB, New York on October 25, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes., The object appeared similar in size to a silver dollar held at arm's length., An intelligence officer at the site suggested it was probably a weather balloon., The object was reported by both tower operations and another officer., Visibility during the observation was unlimited.
sighted object: a bright silver to white object in the sky
witness description: intelligence officer and tower operations personnel
